required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: To Evaluate the Feasibility, Preliminary Safety and Performance of Rezūm System in BPH Treatment in China
clinical_study.official_title: A Real World Study to Evaluate the Feasibility, Preliminary Safety and Performance of Rezūm System in BPH Treatment in China (Rezūm RWS Study)

brief_summary.textblock: A real world study to evaluate the feasibility, preliminary safety and performance of Rezūm system in BPH treatment in China Rezūm RWS study

detailed_description.textblock:
This RWS study is to evaluate the feasibility, preliminary safety and performance of Rezūm system in BPH treatment in China, to generate local real world data from a Chinese BPH population.
The Rezūm System is intended to relieve symptoms, obstructions, and reduce prostate tissue associated with BPH. It is indicated for men ≥50 years of age with a prostate volume ≥ 30cm3 and ≤80cm3. The Rezūm System is also indicated for treatment of prostate with hyperplasia of the central zone and/or a median lobe.

primary_outcome.measure: IPSS change at month 3 - month 6 post Rezūm procedure.
primary_outcome.description: International prostate symptom score (IPSS) is a questionnaire used to indicate the severity of LUTS symptoms, There are 7 questions relating to different symptoms subjects be experiencing and one question relating to overall quality of life.

primary_outcome.measure: Device Related Serious Complications from Rezūm procedure to month 3- month 6 post Rezūm procedure.
primary_outcome.time_frame: From Rezūm procedure to month 3- month 6 post Rezūm procedure.

arm_group.description: The basic principle of the Rezūm System is to deliver a controlled amount of sterile water vapor directly into the hyperplastic tissue in the transition zone of the prostate using a transurethral approach .The stored thermal energy in the vapor is transferred directly onto the cell membranes as the vapor condenses and releases the heat of condensation, causing cell death. Inaddition, this thermal energy transfer collapses the vasculature within the treatment zone, resulting in a bloodless procedure. During procedure the water vapor is created by a heating element in the Rezūm Delivery Device,Saline flush during vapor delivery protects and preserves the urethra.

intervention.description: The basic principle of the Rezūm System is to deliver a controlled amount of sterile water vapor directly into the hyperplastic tissue in the transition zone of the prostate using a transurethral approach .The stored thermal energy in the vapor is transferred directly onto the cell membranes as the vapor condenses and releases the heat of condensation, causing cell death. Inaddition, this thermal energy transfer collapses the vasculature within the treatment zone, resulting in a bloodless procedure. During procedure the water vapor is created by a heating element in the Rezūm Delivery Device,Saline flush during vapor delivery protects and preserves the urethra.

study_pop.textblock: Up to 30 subjects who were diagnosed as BPH and treated with Rezūm system will be collected to get 22 treated subjects with valid data.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- The subjects will provide written informed consent form and agree to data collection.
- The subjects who were diagnosed as BPH and treated by Rezūm procedure in Hainan medical pilot zone will be enrolled in this study.
Exclusion Criteria:
- This is a retrospective study without any formal exclusion criteria.

eligibility.gender_description: The Rezūm System is intended to relieve symptoms, obstructions, and reduce prostate tissue associated with BPH
